## Hi there <img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/74038190/216120986-f2752ca9-fe82-4aa3-befe-0a58db010d85.png" width="25" /> !

## Programming languages learned
#### The first programing language I learned is Java. I think its object-oriented syntax is very interesting. 
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Java-%23FA803A?style=for-the-badge&logo=android&logoColor=white&logoSize=auto&labelColor=black)
#### Afterwards, I learned the Kotlin language with mobile programming. It was a great experience to get to know the mobile world. 
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Kotlin-%237F52FF?style=for-the-badge&logo=kotlin&logoSize=auto&labelColor=black)
#### Thanks to the bootcamp with Codeable, I was able to learn TypeScript, JavaScript, and C#.
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Typescript-%233178C6?style=for-the-badge&logo=typescript&logoSize=auto&labelColor=black)
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Javascript-%23F7DF1E?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoSize=auto&labelColor=black)
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/C%20Sharp-%23512BD4?style=for-the-badge&logo=c%23&logoSize=auto&labelColor=black)
